title: Operation SS Pelican
description: A captivating 3-level Unity video game featuring a pelican protagonist that masterfully combines arcade-style gameplay with puzzle-solving mechanics. Players navigate through interactive levels involving point collection, obstacle avoidance, logical reasoning challenges, and enemy combat. The game showcases completely original artwork, custom icons, and smooth 2D animations, all enhanced by Unity's physics engine and sophisticated AI systems for seamless character interactions and dynamic enemy behavior.

title: Stall Stories Club Website
description: A mobile-responsive website founded and built for the school club Stall Stories. The informative site explains the club's mission, provides clear instructions on how to join, and offers contact information for the team. Features a comprehensive archive of newsletters showcasing all past editions with diverse content including events, jokes, riddles, and recipes, creating an engaging hub for the creative writing community.

title: Shopping List Calculator
description: An intelligent dynamic shopping list application that automatically refactors recommendations based on the user's current fridge inventory. Built with vanilla JavaScript, the app provides a seamless user experience for meal planning and grocery shopping optimization. Utilizes local storage to persist user data and preferences, creating a personalized shopping assistant that helps reduce food waste and streamline grocery trips.

title: IKanji: an AI Driven Japanese Kanji Study App
description: A comprehensive web application that revolutionizes Japanese kanji learning through personalized study experiences. IKanji combines traditional flashcard methods with cutting-edge AI technology to generate contextual practice sentences and adaptive multiple-choice questions. Users can create custom lessons tailored to their learning pace or utilize pre-made Genki Book 1 lessons, making it perfect for both beginners and advanced learners seeking to master Japanese characters efficiently.

title: Interview Status Dashboard
description: Built a dynamic dashboard to automate applicant tracking, featuring real-time status updates, filtering and bulk actions. Developed instance management, CSV upload for bulk data, and backend API integration to improve efficiency.

title: Cornell Digital Tech & Innovation – Course Page Frontend
description: Built the Course page frontend, implementing a responsive timeline and staff section to match Figma designs. Developed custom React hooks and ensured seamless UX across devices by optimizing interactivity and layout.

title: Personal Website
description: Designed and implemented a responsive personal website showcasing projects, an art gallery, and blog with Svelte.

title: Talking Tanuki
description: Engineered an interactive Japanese-language learning companion: a React Native app pairs via classic Bluetooth A2DP with an ESP32-powered plush Tanuki. Users practice conversational Japanese with AI-powered real-time speech (Whisper STT → GPT-4 prompt → OpenAI TTS), choosing grammar targets and proficiency, with both audio and optional text modes. The ESP32 C++ firmware streams natural TTS audio over I²S to a 3W speaker. Adopted by classmates prepping for JLPT oral exams; shown to improve response time and confidence.
